name: Dinosaurs Prehistoric Survivors
description: Grow, Adapt, Survive! Dinosaurs Prehistoric Survivors lets you play as a dinosaur from juvenile to adult in a dynamically populated open world environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer (64 bit Only) Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.6 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer (64 bit Only) Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
